Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-28085 affecting package util-linux for versions less than 2.39.2-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-28085 affecting package util-linux for versions less than 2.39.2-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package util-linux is earlier than 2.39.2-2, affected by CVE-2024-28085
